00024 ManyBodyOperator OpRadiiLS = {
00025  name : "RadiiLS",
00026  rank : 0,
00027  pi : 0,
00028  dim : 2,
00029  size : 2,
00030  par : NULL,
00031  me : calcRadii2LSod
00032 };
00033 
00034 
00035 // <R>=0 and <P>=0 assumed implicitly
00036 // calculates l.sigma !
00037 
00038 static void ob_radii2ls(void* par,
00039           const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00040           const GaussianAux* X, complex double r2ls[2])
00041 {
00042   r2ls[0] += (1+G1->xi)/2* cvec3mult(X->rhoxpi, X->sig)* X->T* X->R;
00043   r2ls[1] += (1-G1->xi)/2* cvec3mult(X->rhoxpi, X->sig)* X->T* X->R;
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 void calcRadii2LS(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00048                   RadiiLS* R2ls)
00049 {
00050   double r2ls[2];
00051   OneBodyOperator op_ob_radii2ls = {dim: 2, opt: 0, par: NULL, me: ob_radii2ls};
00052 
00053   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_radii2ls, r2ls);
00054 
00055   R2ls->r2lsp = r2ls[0];
00056   R2ls->r2lsn = r2ls[1];
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void calcRadii2LSod(void* par,
00061                     const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00062                     const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00063                     RadiiLSod* R2ls)
00064 {
00065   complex double r2ls[2];
00066   OneBodyOperator op_ob_radii2ls = {dim: 2, opt: 0, par: NULL, me: ob_radii2ls};
00067 
00068   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_radii2ls, r2ls);
00069 
00070   R2ls->r2lsp = r2ls[0];
00071   R2ls->r2lsn = r2ls[1];
00072 }

00075 void writeprojectedRadiiLS(FILE* fp,
00076                            const SlaterDet* Q,
00077                            const Projection* P,
00078                            const RadiiLSod** radiils,
00079                            const Eigenstates* E)
00080 {
00081   int odd=P->odd;
00082   int jmax=P->jmax;
00083 
00084   int p,j,i,n;
00085 
00086   char prefix[8];
00087 
00088   RadiiLSod* r;
00089   int* idx;
00090   int ngood;
00091   complex double *norm, *H;
00092 
00093   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00094     for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00095       
00096       ngood = E->ngood[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00097 
00098       if (ngood) {
00099 
00100         if(odd) sprintf(prefix, "[%d/2%c]", j, p ? '-' : '+');
00101         else    sprintf(prefix, "[%d%c]", j/2, p ? '-' : '+');
00102 
00103         idx = E->index[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00104         norm = E->norm[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00105         H = E->v[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00106 
00107         r = radiils[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00108   
00109         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  N      = ", prefix);
00110         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00111           fprintf(fp, "   %8.5f", creal(norm[idx[i]]));
00112         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  H      = ", prefix);
00113         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00114           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", hbc*creal(H[idx[i]]));
00115 
00116         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  R2lsp  = ", prefix);
00117         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00118           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", 0.5*creal(r[idx[i]].r2lsp/norm[idx[i]]));
00119         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  R2lsn  = ", prefix);
00120         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00121           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", 0.5*creal(r[idx[i]].r2lsn/norm[idx[i]]));
00122 
00123        fprintf(fp, "\n");
00124       }
00125     }
00126 }
